Chiara Jaime

Cison di Valmarino

June 20, 2020

Details

Come party with us in the Prosecco valley!

Chiara and Jaime are getting married!!!

The wedding will take place a small Church in Cisón di Valmarino, in the prosecco valley in the countryside of Venice. The ceremony is scheduled at 15.30 in the Chiesa Parrocchiale di Tovena (click for google maps link). After the ceremony there is going to be a reception with food, music and wine! It will be held at Case Marian, a XVII century rural hamlet, very near to the Castelbrando Castle (see the map below) on Saturday, June 20, 2020. The garden of Case Marian itself is a sprawling green space where we can share local wine and food.

We will be outdoors, enjoying the sunny weather, playing games, and eating picnic style. Feel free to wear whatever you will be comfortable in.

In the unlikely case of extreme or inclement weather, please check this webpage for any last-minute adjustments to the wedding schedule.

Traveling to Cisón di Valmarino

We will provide transportation from Mestre ("andata e ritorno"). Just be sure you are on time (we will not wait!). In case you want to arrive by yourself by car, the venue is almost an hour from Venezia.

If you're planning to fly in, the closest airport is Marco Polo International Airport. The airport is about a one hour drive from the venue, in case you want to arrive directly.


Lodging

There are several hotels in the Venice area. We are negotiating preferential rates for our guest (based on confirmation and preferences). In the RSVP we will ask your preferences for accommodation. After that we will send the discount coupons direct to your email.


There are two main options: Staying in Mestre (main land part of the city of Venice), or staying the night before and after at Cison di Valmarino. We've talked

  • 7 days premium hotel Mestre is a hotel located in Mestre. We will organize transportation from and to the venue from the hotel. The price is around 120€ per room (double).

  • Hotel Plaza Venice is is a hotel also located in Mestre. We can also provide transportation from and to the hotel. Prices are around 140€ for a double room.

  • Hotel Case Marian is the hotel where the venue is going to be celebrated. So is just 15 mts from the party. Is convenient if you would like to enjoy the area for the weekend.

  • Hotel Villa MArcello is the other hotel next to the venue. So is just 150 mts from the party, crossing a piazza. Is convenient if you would like to enjoy the area for the weekend (around 130€ for 2 nights if we are able to book 2/3 of the hotel).

There are many other options near Cisón in AirBnB. If you need any help don't doubt in contact us. We will help in all you need.

Répondez s'il vous plaît

Please take one minute to fill in the required information. The deadline to confirm participation is February 15th 2020.

We are happy to celebrate with you!!

Remember to tag your photos with the hashtag #montanellos
